post:
I don’t have an answer to that question. But I do know a NexusBytes VPS will work, 366 days a year! Yet another reason to join the family, if you haven’t <3.

Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.

By popular demand, we are bringing back MegaDealsThursday

1 Extra day gave us the perfect reason to run some super limited clearance promo. Just like Feb 29th doesn’t occur every year, this promo won’t appear again. Stock is limited. Only available in Germany

LeapYearSpecial - Germany Only

* RAM: 2 GB
* Storage: 30 GB (SSD)
* Bandwidth: 2000 GB (@1Gbit)
* CPU Core: 2 @3.4+ GHz (Fair Share Ryzen 7 1700X)
* IPv4: 1
* Location : Germany
* Free Blesta Billing Software 
* Free Windows Server 19/12 Standard License

Order Here : Shopping Cart - NexusBytes LLC
Quaterly : $11.00
Semi-Annual : $21.11
Annual : $37.95

Quick FAQ:

  • Test IP and Download
  • We Accept: Debit/Credit Card, Paypal, AliPay, We Chat Pay, Bitcoin / BitcoinCash / LiteCoin / Ethereum
  • 48 Hours Refund Policy
  • TOS/AUP TLDR; Don’t be a dick, don’t behave like a criminal. Don’t get in trouble, don’t get me in trouble.
  • Free Blesta Billing Software
  • Free Windows Server 19 or windows server 12 standard license with Annual and Semi-Annual payments (VPS-2G and above)
  • Not Eligble for contract buyout or switcher special.
  • No NatBackup VPS
  • DirectAdmin+Softacolous Bundle @$3/mo with code : Bundle50
  • Nested Virt Enabled
  • All codes and plans are recurring. You will be grandfathered in if we ever increase pricing.
  • Promo Plan cannot replace any existing service.
  • If you cancel any existing service within 30 days of signing up for the new promo plan, your promo discount will expire.
